thread.section_title: The Westin Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and staff
thread.title_full: Great location and staff - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sgorelik
title: Great location and staff
text:
We stayed for two days at the Westin to celebrate our anniversary. The room was comfortable and reasonably spacious. The location is perfect and central to most Parisian sights and neighborhoods. The staff was very helpful with sight and dinner suggestions. They hotel has even surprised us with an anniversary gift in the room.
Overall, great experience and would definitely be back.
